TopicTitle: Kerbal NewsFlash - News at a Glance (Issue #02 OUT!)

Articles.Content:
KERBAL NEWSFLASH - ISSUE 02 OUT!

"For kerbals, by kerbals!"

This is meant as a community-made "supplement" to the official Daily Kerbal daily news bulletins from Squad. These will be produced about every other day (more or less), and are designed to give the reader quick info at a glance. All of these are and will be one page long.

Meet the Crew!

FCISuperGuy - Founder, Co-Editor

Normal123 - Co-Editor, Resource-Lurker (Is that a thing? Because that's what he's doing LOL )

Issue #01

Issue #02

Edited August 28, 2014 by FCISuperGuy
Added Issue 2
I like this idea! I already read this article, and it summed up this last week's hype very well!
I really like this. Maybe you could make it a bit longer if it is weekly news, I've read through all in 2 minutes ^-^

MEGA is very slow for downloads TBH...

Nice content though.

I really like this. Maybe you could make it a bit longer if it is weekly news, I've read through all in 2 minutes ^-^

Maybe more often...

Niiice. I'd love to see this expanded
I enjoyed it. I have some more Goss from Max Maps from when he did a stream it was quite interesting.

MEGA is very slow for downloads TBH...

Nice content though.

It's 2MB. Does it really take that long?

Maybe more often...

Might change it, but my DropBox is almost full.

Yeah, more often would be a great idea.
It's a newsletter? Good idea, wrong format. You were trying to make a fan website.

It's a newsletter? Good idea, wrong format. You were trying to make a fan website.

I intended the format to be something like you'd pick up on your way to work, quickly read it after arriving and throw it in the trash so your boss won't catch you messing around. It's not a full-fledged newsletter, therefore the name NewsFLASH.

Ladies and gentlemen, the second edition of the Kerbal NewsFlash is out! Grab it hot off the (digital PDF-making) press! Any questions will be answered below.

Also, a new format was used in this edition. Thanks to me switching to Pages instead of Word for this stuff, I made an entire new template that looks better (based on my friends' opinions) and is somewhat more compact.
Edition 2 seems to be down :-)

Edition 2 seems to be down :-)

Hey, thanks for the mention!

Hey, thanks for the mention!

No problem! I look for those who've been contributing regularly, and I'm prowling the forums all day... Cue a modified version of that Christmas song which I always forget the name of.

I intended the format to be something like you'd pick up on your way to work, quickly read it after arriving and throw it in the trash so your boss won't catch you messing around. It's not a full-fledged newsletter, therefore the name NewsFLASH.
